column2: Civeo Corp. engages in the provision of workforce accommodations, logistics and facility management services to the natural resource industry. The company is headquartered in Houston, Texas and currently employs 700 full-time employees. The firm's scalable modular facilities provide long-term and temporary accommodations. Once facilities are deployed in the field, it also provides catering and food services, housekeeping, laundry, facility management, water and wastewater treatment, power generation, communications and redeployment logistics. The company operates in three business segments: Canada, Australia and United States. The company is a Canada's integrated provider of accommodations services for people working in remote locations.
Three Allen Center, 333 Clay St Ste 4980
